fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Budget, Consumers, Education and training, Enlargement, Employment and Social Affairs, Taxation, Youth, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Research and innovation, External Relations, Trans-European Networks, Public Health, Digital economy and society, Borders and Security
eu_initiatives: ILGA-Europe is working on EU legislative proposals, actions and awareness raising around LGBTI rights, i.e. for example the horizontal anti-discrimination directive, work on an EU internal human rights mechanism, EU LGBTI strategy, employment and social inclusion, gender equality initiatives, hate crime and hate speech, freedom of movement, asylum, policy initiatives regarding non-discrimination in the area of health and education, as well as LGBTI rights in the accession and neighbourhood policies.
organisation_name: The European Region of the International Lesbian, Gay, Bisexual, Trans and Intersex Association (ILGA-Europe)
